welcome_message_body: Welcome to Consolacion, Philippines! Get ready to experience the charm of this bustling city known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and beautiful natural attractions. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything Consolacion has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.address: Consolacion Community College, Consolacion 6001, 6001 Consolacion, Cebu
